HeroSection.description: Comprehensive real estate financial planning platform. Turn your property dreams into achievable financial plans with intelligent calculations and market insights.

FeaturesSection.heading: Everything You Need to Succeed
FeaturesSection.description: Powerful financial planning tools designed to help you buy, invest, and grow your real estate portfolio.
FeaturesSection.feature1Description: Built with Next.js 15 and optimized for performance. Your users will love the speed.
FeaturesSection.feature2Description: Authentication, authorization, and data protection built-in with industry best practices.
FeaturesSection.feature3Description: Built-in team management, permissions, and collaboration tools for growing businesses.
FeaturesSection.feature4Description: Comprehensive analytics and reporting to understand your users and grow your business.

SocialProofSection.heading: Loved by Builders Worldwide
SocialProofSection.testimonial1Content: FinHome helped us understand exactly what we could afford and plan our home purchase timeline. We bought our first home with confidence!
SocialProofSection.testimonial2Content: The code quality is exceptional and the documentation is crystal clear. Highly recommended!
SocialProofSection.testimonial3Content: The financial scenarios and timeline visualization made it easy to compare different property investments. Great tool for planning!

CTASection.heading: Ready to Start Your Real Estate Journey?
CTASection.description: Join thousands of entrepreneurs who have already built successful businesses with our template.

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Learn about our mission to help Vietnamese families achieve their real estate dreams through smart financial planning.

HeroSection.description: We're on a mission to democratize real estate investment by providing Vietnamese families with the financial planning tools they need to make informed property decisions.

ValuesSection.heading: Our Values
ValuesSection.description: The principles that guide everything we do and help us serve our customers better.
ValuesSection.customerFirstDescription: Everything we do is designed to help our customers succeed and grow their businesses.
ValuesSection.focusOnQualityDescription: We believe in building products that are reliable, secure, and performant from day one.
ValuesSection.continuousInnovationDescription: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
ValuesSection.openTransparentDescription: We build in the open, share our learnings, and believe in honest communication.

StorySection.heading: Our Story
StorySection.paragraph1: Founded in 2025, we started with a simple observation: buying property in Vietnam shouldn't require complex financial calculations and uncertainty about affordability.
StorySection.paragraph2: After helping numerous Vietnamese families with their real estate journeys, we noticed they were struggling with the same challenges - affordability calculations, market timing, and long-term financial planning.
StorySection.paragraph3: That's when we decided to create FinHome - a comprehensive platform that would allow families to focus on what matters most: finding and securing their perfect home with confidence.

CTASection.heading: Ready to Join Our Mission?
CTASection.description: Whether you're buying your first home or expanding your property portfolio, we're here to help you succeed.

metadata.title: Cookie Policy
metadata.description: Learn about how we use cookies and similar technologies.

CookiePolicyPage.heading: Cookie Policy
CookiePolicyPage.whatAreCookiesParagraph: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and analyzing how you use our site.
CookiePolicyPage.howWeUseCookiesParagraph: We use cookies for the following purposes:
CookiePolicyPage.essentialCookiesParagraph: These cookies are necessary for our website to function properly and cannot be turned off. They include:
CookiePolicyPage.analyticsCookiesParagraph: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website:
CookiePolicyPage.preferenceCookiesParagraph: These cookies remember your choices and preferences:
CookiePolicyPage.managingPreferencesParagraph: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
CookiePolicyPage.browserSettingsParagraph: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
CookiePolicyPage.browserSettingsList4: Set up notifications when cookies are created
CookiePolicyPage.impactOfDisablingParagraph: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website and limit your ability to use some features.
CookiePolicyPage.thirdPartyCookiesParagraph: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies, including:
CookiePolicyPage.thirdPartyCookiesList1: Vercel Analytics: For website performance monitoring
CookiePolicyPage.thirdPartyCookiesList3: Supabase: For authentication and data storage
CookiePolicyPage.thirdPartyCookiesReview: These third parties have their own privacy policies and cookie practices, which we encourage you to review.
CookiePolicyPage.updatesToPolicyParagraph: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
CookiePolicyPage.contactUsParagraph: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

metadata.title: Privacy Policy
metadata.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

PrivacyPolicyPage.heading: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.introductionParagraph1: {companyName} ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website {websiteUrl} and use our services.
PrivacyPolicyPage.introductionParagraph2: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access our services.
PrivacyPolicyPage.personalInformationParagraph: We may collect personally identifiable information that you provide to us, including:
PrivacyPolicyPage.personalInformationList1: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
PrivacyPolicyPage.personalInformationList3: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
PrivacyPolicyPage.personalInformationList4: Profile information (company name, job title, profile picture)
PrivacyPolicyPage.usageDataParagraph: We automatically collect certain information when you use our services:
PrivacyPolicyPage.usageDataList1: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
PrivacyPolicyPage.usageDataList2: Usage patterns (pages visited, features used, time spent)
PrivacyPolicyPage.usageDataList3: Log data (access times, error logs, performance metrics)
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationParagraph: We use the information we collect to:
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationList1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationList2: Process transactions and send related information
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationList4: Respond to customer service requests and support needs
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationList5: Personalize your experience and deliver targeted content
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationList6: Monitor and analyze usage patterns and trends
PrivacyPolicyPage.howWeUseInformationList7: Detect, prevent, and address fraud and security issues
PrivacyPolicyPage.informationSharingParagraph: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:
PrivacyPolicyPage.serviceProvidersParagraph: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and services, including:
PrivacyPolicyPage.legalRequirementsParagraph: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or if we believe that such disclosure is necessary to:
PrivacyPolicyPage.legalRequirementsList1: Comply with legal processes or government requests
PrivacyPolicyPage.legalRequirementsList2: Protect our rights, property, or safety
PrivacyPolicyPage.legalRequirementsList3: Protect the rights, property, or safety of our users
PrivacyPolicyPage.legalRequirementsList4: Prevent fraud or other illegal activities
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityParagraph: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include:
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityList1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityList4: Employee training on data protection practices
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityList5: Employee training on data protection practices
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityWarning: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
PrivacyPolicyPage.yourRightsParagraph: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
PrivacyPolicyPage.accessPortabilityParagraph: You can access and download your personal data through your account settings.
PrivacyPolicyPage.correctionParagraph: You can update your personal information through your account settings or by contacting us.
PrivacyPolicyPage.deletionParagraph: You can delete your account and personal data by contacting us. Some information may be retained for legal or business purposes.
PrivacyPolicyPage.marketingCommunicationsParagraph: You can opt out of marketing communications by using the unsubscribe link in emails or updating your preferences in your account.
PrivacyPolicyPage.cookiesTrackingParagraph: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences, but disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our services.
PrivacyPolicyPage.internationalDataTransfersParagraph: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with applicable laws.
PrivacyPolicyPage.childrensPrivacyParagraph: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.
PrivacyPolicyPage.changesToPolicyParagraph1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
PrivacyPolicyPage.changesToPolicyParagraph2: Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
PrivacyPolicyPage.contactUsParagraph: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Help.title: Help
Help.description: Find answers to your questions and get technical support

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions
faq.q1: How to create your first financial plan?
faq.a1: To create a new financial plan, go to "Financial Plans" in the left menu and click "Create New Plan". You will be guided through each step to enter information about your investment goals, financial resources and timeline.
faq.q2: How to compare multiple investment scenarios?
faq.a2: Use the "Scenario Comparison" feature to analyze different investment options. You can adjust parameters like interest rates, loan terms, and tax rates to see the impact on expected returns.
faq.q3: How does the Laboratory feature work?
faq.a3: The Laboratory allows you to experiment with investment parameters in a safe environment. You can change variable values and see immediate impact on financial results without affecting your main plans.
faq.a4: Go to "Profile" in the sidebar menu to update personal information like name, email, phone number and other details. Remember to click "Save Changes" after editing.
faq.a5: We use leading security measures to protect your data. All information is encrypted during transmission and storage. You can view details about our security policy in the Settings section.
faq.q6: Can I export financial plan data?
faq.a6: Yes, you can export financial plan data as Excel or PDF files. Go to plan details and click the "Export Data" button to download.
